CustomFieldTranslation.name: NextDonationDateMatchRangeDays__c
CustomFieldTranslation.help: The number of days before or after the Next Donation Date that NPSP won't create a new installment Opportunity if the next open Opportunity's Close Date is changed. Applies only to Recurring Donations where Installment Period is Monthly or Yearly.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: Next Donation Date Match Range
